title: 306.36 NEW BOARD; ORGANIZATION.
text: In case of the death, removal, resignation, or disability of all the members of the board, the trust, until the organization of a new board, vests in the district court of the county in which the cemetery is located. The board may be reconstituted by the court on application of any person interested and on notice as the court may direct. Upon qualifying, the appointed trustees have the rights and powers of the original board. A vacancy in the board continuing for one year may be filled by the court.
